Package com.example.client_schedule.helper

Class CRUD<T>

java.lang.Object
com.example.client_schedule.helper.TypeToken<T>
com.example.client_schedule.helper.CRUD<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the Entity class type
Direct Known Subclasses:
AppointmentDB, ContactDB, CountryDB, CustomerDB, DivisionDB, UserDB
public class CRUD<T> extends TypeToken<T>
Helper class for CRUD operations.

      type - Class type of the entity.
